import Link from "next/link"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { IoIosArrowDown, IoIosArrowForward } from "react-icons/io"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getAllCategories } from "../../../redux/actions"; const Navigation = () => { const category = useSelector(state => state.category) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAllCategories()) }, []) console.log(category) const renderCategories = (categories) => { let myCategories = [] for(let category of categories){ myCategories.push(
    {category.name}
{/* {category.children.length > 0 ? (
    {renderCategories(category.children)}
) : null} */}
) } return myCategories } return (
{/*
    {category.categories.length > 0 ? renderCategories(category.categories) : null}
*/}
  • Home
  • {category.categories.length > 0 ? renderCategories(category.categories) : null} {/* Men */} {/*
    • Watches
    • Smartwatches
    • Eyewear
      • Sunglasses
      • Glasses
    • Bracelets
  • Women
    • Watches
    • Smartwatches
    • Eyewear
      • Sunglasses
      • Glasses
    • Bracelets
    */}
  • About Us
); }; export default Navigation;
